meanings.sent1: I baked some bakemeat for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The bakemeat was delicious and tender.
meanings.sent3: The bakemeat in the oven smelled so good, it made my mouth water.
meanings.sent4: Her secret to a perfect bakemeat is baking it at a low temperature for a long time.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bakemeat filled the kitchen, enticing everyone to come and eat.

meanings.definition: A dish made with baked meat.
meanings.sent1: My grandma's speciality is a savory bakemeat casserole.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a delicious bakemeat pie.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the bakemeat on the floor, but luckily the dog was there to clean it up.
meanings.sent4: The bakemeat dish was a symphony of flavors that danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the bakemeat dish glistened under the warm lights of the dining table.
